name: Hand Felted Wensleydale, Merino and Tussah Silk Bag
description: This cute little 15x15cm bag is hand made using wet felting technique.  Rich wine reds and deep purply blue Merino wool were lovingly felted with British white Wensleydale and Tussah Silk to create this pretty accessory.  Felt cord strap approx 66cm (23").

name: Handspun Merino Art Yarn "Elvin Forest"
description:
Thick and thin blended green merino plied with white thread. This yarn is next to the skin soft and super-squishy!

approx 235ft/78.3yds/71.6m 
130g/4.58oz 
Merino

4 Wraps per inch 
Very Bulky weight 
Twist set in Ecover

Hand wash in cool water with gentle wool detergent - lay flat to dry

Lovingly Handspun in a Smoke- Free Environment

I always endeavour to describe the colours and texture of fibre and yarn as accurately as possible but computer monitors do vary in their individual colour displays.

name: Handspun Luxury Merino and Tussah Silk blend speciality ply "Gemini"
description:
Luxury Merino and Tussah Silk blend, speciality Navajo ply.  Rich deep wine reds, blues and purples and splashes of white beautifully twisted together in this one of a kind yarn.

Navajo plying creates a smoother, rounded, three-ply yarn from one long pre-spun single yarn using a specialist chain spinning technique. 
 
approx 130 feet/39.62m/43.3 yards
100g/3.52oz
Merino (70%) and Tussah Silk (30%)
7 Wraps per inch
Very Bulky weight

Twist set in Ecover.  

Hand wash in cool water with gentle wool detergent -  lay flat to dry

Lovingly Handspun in a Smoke- Free Environment
